page.title: 17St.John's Parish Church
page.content: Donisthorpe Parish Church is situated on Church Street in the centre of the village.The Sunday morning service begins at 10 o'clock and ends at 11 o'clock.The evening service begins at 6 o'clock and ends at 7.30pm.Sunday school takes place in the morning whilst the service is going on. On June 8th 1985 there was a garden fete in the vicarage garden.The money raised was given to charity. Every Thursday evening there is a choir practice. There are 3 men,six ladies and 3 girls in the choir.Also on Thursdays there are meetings of the Fellowship groups.Another group held at the church is the Pathfinders.Older children perform plays and read at the family service.
